text: @saveourcoastMUM @AUThackeray @mybmc @OfficeofUT @CMOMaharashtra @mybmcCoastalRd @AshokChavanINC @mieknathshinde Is Govt Priority environmental degradation at cost of marine #biodiversity ? Who benefits from hidden Real Estate of 135 acres? Even during the #coronavirus lockdown, why work on coastal #road continues? Imminent #sea level rise will lead to coastal #flooding. @IASassociation https://t.co/MORwHkyFHk
